template.field: if update([Field]) begin set @OLDVAL = substring(IsNull(([MSOld]), ''),1,255) set @NEWVAL = substring(IsNull(([MSNew]), ''),1,255) if @OLDVAL <> @NEWVAL set @S = @S + '[Field]('+@OLDVAL+')->('+@NEWVAL+') ' end
template.line: if len(@S) > len('[Short]:') begin exec ADD_STME [STME_NR], [WERK_NR], @PK, 'N', @S end end close CUR_INS deallocate CUR_INS end end;
